Here is the list with "hot" or "ugly" added to each item:

call you names - ugly
give you angry looks - ugly
put down your friends - ugly
say things to scare you - ugly
make you do something embarrassing - ugly
encourage you to open up - hot
open to your ideas - hot
excited to see you - hot
listen attentively to you - hot
make an effort with your family - hot

As your partner, I want you to know that I appreciate the positive behaviors on this list and strive to exhibit them in our relationship.
